## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G21150](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G21150)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtBBX32, BBX32, EIP6</u>
- **Gene Name:** B-box domain protein 32, EMF1-Interacting Protein 6
- **Description:**   B-box 32;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G21150.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G21150.1)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_059534 (homo)]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Under FRc conditions, the length mutant hypocotyls is similar to that of wild-type plants.  Under Rc conditions, the hypocotyl length is decreased and the cotyledon area is smaller.
